SD_ROM_SecondNight.synopsis: Romance cutscene after CAMP_Astarion_CRD_SecondNight dialog in which you agreed to sleep with Astarion again.
SD_ROM_SecondNight.how_to_trigger: Origin Debug Book - Astarion - Recruit as CompanionOrigin Debug Book - Astarion - Act 1 - Romance (Second night) - Queue night.Click on Astarion. Agree to sleep with him. Click on the bedroll.

CRD_SecondNight.synopsis: Second time Astarion propositions the player to sleep with him - optional CRD between his act 1 and act 2 critical path romance scenes.The player starts to realise Astarion might have been just playing an act to seduce them the whole time, and that his affection for them might not be genuine. Bridges the gap before he confesses this in his act 2 romance, and says he wants to stop manipulating people and have a real relationship.Could either be triggered at the party, or any time before the act 2 scene, as long as you've slept with him before.If player agrees to meet up with Astarion later, it will show them meeting up at the bedroll when the player clicks to rest automatically if it's not at the party, if no other overnight scene is queued. If it's at the party, the player has to choose at the bedroll menu to meet up with him.
CRD_SecondNight.how_to_trigger: Origin Debug Book - Astarion - Recruit as CompanionOrigin Debug Book - Astarion - Act 1 - Romance (Second night) - Queue night.Click on Astarion

SD_ROM_SecondNight_2.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_SecondNight_2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shows Astarion and the player meeting upInternalNodeContext: AFTER CLICKING ON BEDROLL MENU IN PARTY, or just going to sleep after agreeing to have sex with him later in a CFM version

SD_ROM_SecondNight_1.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_SecondNight_1.text: I have missed you. And now you're all mine, and I'm all yours. Until morning at least.
SD_ROM_SecondNight_1.context: NodeContext: "until morning at least" with a smile - he's not about to commit to anything long-term

SD_ROM_SecondNight_0.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_SecondNight_0.text: Let's see where the night takes us.
SD_ROM_SecondNight_0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion and the player get closer, then a fade to black.

CRD_SecondNight_10.speaker: Astarion
CRD_SecondNight_10.text: Here's my little treat with their cheeks all flushed. You will come to my bed tonight, won't you?

CRD_SecondNight_44.speaker: Player
CRD_SecondNight_44.text: You don't have to ask twice.

CRD_SecondNight_4.speaker: Astarion
CRD_SecondNight_4.text: I'm amazed you managed to keep your mind clear enough to fight, I've been thinking about our last night together ceaselessly.

CRD_SecondNight_53.speaker: Astarion
CRD_SecondNight_53.text: I'll be in quite a spot of mortal peril if you let me keep distracting myself dreaming instead of doing.

CRD_SecondNight_41.speaker: Astarion
CRD_SecondNight_41.text: We can't have that, can we? It would be very dangerous.

CRD_SecondNight_42.speaker: Player
CRD_SecondNight_42.text: On second thought, maybe not tonight.

CRD_SecondNight_8.speaker: Player
CRD_SecondNight_8.text: 'A little treat'? You can do better than that.

CRD_SecondNight_61.speaker: Astarion
CRD_SecondNight_61.text: Oh, I certainly can, it would be my pleasure.

CRD_SecondNight_14.speaker: Player
CRD_SecondNight_14.text: Very presumptuous. I'm undecided what I'll do tonight yet.

CRD_SecondNight_16.speaker: Astarion
CRD_SecondNight_16.text: Ah, you need a bit of enticing, let me see.

CRD_SecondNight_40.speaker: Astarion
CRD_SecondNight_40.text: All these accolades from the Tieflings are nothing compared to the sound of my name, cried from your lips.

CRD_SecondNight_3.speaker: Astarion
CRD_SecondNight_3.text: Every time I heard the Tieflings cry, I remembered how you sounded crying for me.

CRD_SecondNight_62.speaker: Astarion
CRD_SecondNight_62.text: Hmm, let me give it another go:

CRD_SecondNight_34.speaker: Astarion
CRD_SecondNight_34.text: Every part of your perfect body whispers temptation - it's as if the Gods made you just to ruin me.

CRD_SecondNight_17.speaker: Player
CRD_SecondNight_17.text: You're sweet, and sillier than I thought.

CRD_SecondNight_52.speaker: Astarion
CRD_SecondNight_52.text: I can go on all night with the flattery, but is that really all you want?

CRD_SecondNight_20.speaker: Player
CRD_SecondNight_20.text: Did these really work on Cazador's targets?

CRD_SecondNight_21.speaker: Astarion
CRD_SecondNight_21.text: Well, they worked on you last time, didn't they?

CRD_SecondNight_54.speaker: Astarion
CRD_SecondNight_54.text: How about if I said these little words... Everyone's favourite...

CRD_SecondNight_0.speaker: Astarion
CRD_SecondNight_0.context: NodeContext: Pretends to say it very sweetly and innocently

CRD_SecondNight_45.speaker: Astarion
CRD_SecondNight_45.text: Ah ha, but a rather beautiful lie, nonetheless.

CRD_SecondNight_29.speaker: Player
CRD_SecondNight_29.text: A little soon to say that, don't you think?

CRD_SecondNight_2.speaker: Astarion
CRD_SecondNight_2.text: Well, it can be true, if only for tonight.

CRD_SecondNight_32.speaker: Astarion
CRD_SecondNight_32.text: Now, as much as I relish standing around and saying all my favourite lines at you, I'd much rather we got to experience each others' full portfolio of talents once again.

CRD_SecondNight_22.speaker: Player
CRD_SecondNight_22.text: I'll come find you after everyone is asleep.

CRD_SecondNight_18.speaker: Player
CRD_SecondNight_18.text: I'll come find you after everyone is asleep.

CRD_SecondNight_47.speaker: Player
CRD_SecondNight_47.text: I'd love that, Astarion, but you know I can't. I'd burn you alive.

CRD_SecondNight_38.speaker: Astarion
CRD_SecondNight_38.text: Oh I don't know. It might be worth it.

CRD_SecondNight_55.speaker: Player
CRD_SecondNight_55.text: I don't think I really want this.

CRD_SecondNight_28.speaker: Astarion
CRD_SecondNight_28.text: I am, it's hard not to with you.

CRD_SecondNight_11.speaker: Player
CRD_SecondNight_11.text: So many honeyed words, as usual.

CRD_SecondNight_59.speaker: Astarion
CRD_SecondNight_59.text: Not half as sweet as when I tasted you.

CRD_SecondNight_37.speaker: Player
CRD_SecondNight_37.text: Is that the best you can do?

CRD_SecondNight_7.speaker: Astarion
CRD_SecondNight_7.text: When I'm with you, I feel practically alive, yet I crave only to die again with you.

CRD_SecondNight_50.speaker: Player
CRD_SecondNight_50.text: Sorry, I may want to spend some time with someone else.

CRD_SecondNight_9.speaker: Astarion
CRD_SecondNight_9.text: By all means, do something less exceptional, and think of me while you're doing it.

CRD_SecondNight_6.speaker: Astarion
CRD_SecondNight_6.text: If you don't remember how much you enjoyed it last time, I would like to try again, until you can think of nothing else.

CRD_SecondNight_31.speaker: Player
CRD_SecondNight_31.text: Oh, I like you best. I can't help myself.

CRD_SecondNight_24.speaker: Player
CRD_SecondNight_24.text: I'm sure we will get another chance soon. But not right now.

CRD_SecondNight_46.speaker: Astarion
CRD_SecondNight_46.text: I look forward to the day. Meanwhile, my hunger for you will only deepen.

CRD_SecondNight_5.speaker: Player
CRD_SecondNight_5.text: I think it's better if we leave last time as a once-off.

CRD_SecondNight_56.speaker: Astarion
CRD_SecondNight_56.text: Well, well, excuse me while I die of a broken heart.

CRD_SecondNight_26.speaker: Astarion
CRD_SecondNight_26.text: In all honesty, it is a shame. That time was special to me. I've gotten on my back ten thousand times or more, and forgotten half of them.

CRD_SecondNight_23.speaker: Astarion
CRD_SecondNight_23.text: But you... you I'll remember. Have a fine evening, dear.
